item.title: Super Bowls Are Not the Ultimate Metric For Denver
item.description: The Denver Broncos have three Super Bowls, but one of the most prolific offenses in the 2013 team came up short in the playoffs. Which of these teams is the best Broncos team since the 1990 season? ggplot() + geom_point(data=seasons, aes(x=OSRS, y=DSRS), color = "grey") + geom_point(data = best, aes(x=OSRS, y=DSRS), color = "orange") + geom_point(data = others, aes(x=OSRS, y=DSRS), color = "blue") + geom_vline(data=seasons, mapping=aes(xintercept=1.66875), color="black") + geom_hline(data=seasons, mapping=aes(yintercept = 0.

item.title: What is the best Denver Broncos team since 1990?
